name: The Bell
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a skill: Gives 1 Shield point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a skill:</color> Gives 1 $[K6] point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a skill:</color> Gives 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)
